doc.title: Palestinian Strings
doc.plot: Twenty four year old Philip Halloun has left home with one simple goal - to perform live for the first time with his own songs in Palestine. While pursuing his childhood dream, he is confronted with the most important personal question of all - who is he? His dream and questions take the audience to the West Bank, Hebron, Jerusalem. However, our story begins in the dusty mountain village of Isifya where Philip lives with his uncle. Hoping to get a chance to get his first concert in the village Bir Zeit in Palestine Philip has to travel far, but will his dream come true?
